CMArticle.title: Perfect Chef - About Us

div.p: Welcome to Perfect Chef

As a premium sub-brand of Aurora Retail Inc., Perfect Chef is an omni-channel shop and customer magazine that delivers seasonal news, ideas, recipes and handpicked products to inspire cooks and connoisseurs of the good life – in all of its forms. Consumers can explore our content in our printed magazine & catalog, as well as in our stores and online.
How CoreMedia LiveContext enables our site

The engaging online experiences that characterize Perfect Chef’s online presence are enabled by CoreMedia LiveContext, a next-generation digital engagement application that empowers online retailers to incrementally transform their online stores. Based on deep, real-time IBM WebSphere Commerce integration, it allows us to create and manage visually engaging experiences and immersive content.
CoreMedia LiveContext provides the Perfect Chef team with the following state-of-the-art capabilities:

ul.li: Ability to Blend Marketing Content and Real-Time Product Information for Product-Aligned Storytelling

div.p: Content created and managed in CoreMedia LiveContext can be combined with real-time product information to create shopping experiences based on real-life user stories. Stories can be constructed around virtually any product or collection of products in IBM WebSphere Commerce.

ul.li: Digital Experience Hub for Unified Customer Experiences across All Touchpoints and Languages

div.p: CoreMedia LiveContext is based on a unique integration of the CoreMedia content management system and the IBM WebSphere Commerce platform that allows us to create unified brand and e-Commerce experiences that bridge the gap between our online store and our omni-channel marketing sites. CoreMedia LiveContext is also capable of delivering these bended experiences to all of our regional sites — in multiple languages.

ul.li: Stunning Design Elements and Exciting Layouts

div.p: CoreMedia LiveContext provides us with a variety of free form layout options and a comprehensive catalog of visually appealing design elements — including slide shows, carousel views, tabs, and more. And, because CoreMedia LiveContext separates content from layout and presentation, business we can quickly restructure and re-use content in a variety of styles and layouts to maximize impact and effectiveness

Since visual presentation is the top factor affecting a consumer’s purchase decision, companies must make their Web stores aesthetically appealing and visually engaging. CoreMedia LiveContext makes it easy to manage, edit, and integrate a wide variety of rich media content types including images, PDFs, binary files, style sheets, and sophisticated page layouts.

To help us address the growing importance of smart, internet-enabled mobile devices, CoreMedia LiveContext provides built-in responsive and adaptive Web capabilities as a foundation for building modern, effective user experiences.

The creation of the stories on the Perfect Chef site is the result of close coordination between our marketing and e-Commerce teams. In order to ensure that these two groups can work together efficiently while still retaining their unique strengths and processes. CoreMedia provides both lightweight and more structured collaboration tools that cover the entire content lifecycle from the creation, to approval, delivery and analysis.
